mapper.select: -- retrieveFxaRlisCrgrAnlSearchList 자산담당자 목록 조회 SELECT a.WBS_CD AS "wbsCd" ,su.sa_dept_new as deptCd ,a.prj_NM as prjNm ,FRC.CRGR_ID AS "crgrId" ,SU.sa_name AS "crgrNm" ,STUFF( ( SELECT ','+CAST(SU2.sa_name AS CHAR) FROM IRIS_FXA_RLIS_CRGR F2 ,IRIS_SSO_USER SU2 WHERE F2.DEL_YN = 'N' AND F2.RLIS_CRGR_CL_CD = 'RFP' AND F2.CRGR_ID = SU2.sa_sabun_new AND F2.DEPT_CD = FRC.DEPT_CD GROUP BY SU2.sa_name,F2.CRGR_ID ORDER BY SU2.sa_name FOR XML PATH('') ) , 1, 1, '') AS "rfpNm" ,STUFF( ( SELECT ','+CAST(F2.CRGR_ID AS CHAR) FROM IRIS_FXA_RLIS_CRGR F2 ,IRIS_SSO_USER SU2 WHERE F2.DEL_YN = 'N' AND F2.RLIS_CRGR_CL_CD = 'RFP' AND F2.CRGR_ID = SU2.sa_sabun_new AND F2.DEPT_CD = FRC.DEPT_CD GROUP BY SU2.sa_name,F2.CRGR_ID ORDER BY SU2.sa_name FOR XML PATH('') ) , 1, 1, '') AS "rfpId" ,STUFF( ( SELECT ','+CAST(SU2.sa_user AS CHAR) FROM IRIS_FXA_RLIS_CRGR F2 ,IRIS_SSO_USER SU2 WHERE F2.DEL_YN = 'N' AND F2.RLIS_CRGR_CL_CD = 'RFP' AND F2.CRGR_ID = SU2.sa_sabun_new AND F2.DEPT_CD = FRC.DEPT_CD GROUP BY SU2.sa_user,F2.CRGR_ID ORDER BY SU2.sa_user FOR XML PATH('') ) , 1, 1, '') AS "rfpUserId" ,convert(nvarchar(10), FRC.FRST_RGST_DT, 23) as "regDt" FROM IRIS_WBS_PJT_IF a INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT WBS_CD FROM IRIS_FXA_INFO_MST WHERE FXA_ST_CD ='USE') B ON B.WBS_CD = A.WBS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_FXA_RLIS_CRGR FRC ON FRC.WBS_CD = a.WBS_CD AND FRC.RLIS_CRGR_CL_CD = 'CRGR' LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER SU ON FRC.CRGR_ID = SU.SA_SABUN_NEW ORDER BY A.PRJ_NM
